channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: An immigrant in Wisconsin released on bond after false accusation he threatened Trump
item.description: An immigrant from Mexico who was falsely accused of threatening to assassinate President Donald Trump has been released from a Wisconsin jail on bond

item.title: Closing arguments: Is Karen Read's murder trial a tale of love gone wrong or a police coverup?
